New Records: Dunith Wellalage scored 67 not out, his highest ODI score; he also took 2 wickets, a new record for him in ODIs
Key Match Events: The match was tied after India failed to chase 231; Shivam Dube almost won it but was dismissed; Sri Lankan spinners were crucial in picking up wickets; Rohit Sharma's dismissal was significant
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch offered considerable assistance to spinners; the match being tied was a notable outcome
